basicinfo.name: Li Yang
basicinfo.Research: network security, web service, data mining
basicinfo.Expertise: C program, IOS development, WEB development, Oracle, Mysql, photography
basicinfo.introduction: After graduated from the Zhejiang University computer system structure, I take my research in Hangzhou Normal University. The main research area are web services, mobile architecture, network security and data mining. I have taken over the national 863 project and several research projects. I have published more than 20 academic papers in journals and conferences. Over the years, i cooperate with the  several companies with research projects, such as HUAWEI, Zhejiang mobile, Zhejiang industrial and Commercial Bank of Zhejiang Province, Hangzhou military region, Dian diagnosis and Sysmex Company of Shanghai.

Expertise.content: C/C++, Object C, Pascal, Java, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Markdown
